title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: Active Collaborative Learning Modules for Digital Anatomy

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe the three-dimensional relationships of the respiratory system and surrounding structures at 80% or higher using a 3D anatomy app.
Learners can identify 90% or more of key anatomical terms using labeled diagrams created through cooperative learning group activities.
Learners can write a project report explaining the functional interrelationships of the respiratory system based on digital learning materials.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
